description: This file defines an ApiClient class for interacting with a backend API using HTTP requests. It includes methods for GET and POST requests, dynamically configured via environment variables, and serves as a utility for API communication within a Flutter project.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with a REST API, with configurable base URL and simple GET and POST wrappers.

methods.name: ApiClient.create
methods.description: Factory constructor that initializes the ApiClient with the API base URL fetched from environment variables or defaults to a mock URL.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified API path.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request to the specified API path with optional headers and body.
